title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Explore a vast world and discover hidden secrets in this acclaimed adventure game.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An epic tale of witcher Geralt seeking his adopted daughter in a vast, open world.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Immerse yourself in a world of outlaws and adventure in this stunning open-world game.

title: God of War
description: Join Kratos on an epic journey through Norse mythology in this critically acclaimed action game.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Explore the futuristic city of Night City in this highly anticipated RPG.

title: Horizon Zero Dawn
description: Embark on an epic journey through a post-apocalyptic world dominated by robotic creatures.

title: Persona 5
description: Dive into the lives of high school students by day and phantom thieves by night in this acclaimed JRPG.

title: Bloodborne
description: A dark and challenging action RPG set in the gothic city of Yharnam.

title: Stardew Valley
description: Create the farm of your dreams in this charming farming simulation game.

title: Monster Hunter: World
description: Hunt down massive monsters and discover the thrill of the hunt in this action-packed RPG.

title: Celeste
description: A beautifully crafted platformer about climbing a mountain, both literally and metaphorically.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: Experience intense combat and explore a beautifully crafted world set in late 1500s Sengoku period Japan.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: Become a samurai warrior and embark on an epic adventure to liberate Tsushima Island.

title: Marvel's Spider-Man
description: Swing through New York City as Spider-Man and protect the city from a new threat.
